content.raw: @nkoenig my [whole proposal](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/SRCSIM-26) was published to the internal tracker and a mail asking for comments was sent to the internal mail list. I can publish it here if that helps. As soon as someone give the proposal a look I can start implementing the different mechanisms to solve this problem and simplify the installation.
